_comment: Custom Tool - Tavily Search. We handle execution via Tavily API.
name: tavily_search
description: Search the web using Tavily AI search. Use this as a fallback when web_fetch fails to access a URL, or for general web searches. Returns search results with titles, URLs, and content snippets.

query.description: The search query. Can be a URL to find information about a specific page, or a general search query.

search_depth.description: Search depth. 'advanced' retrieves more relevant content but costs more.

include_answer.description: Include an AI-generated answer summarizing the search results.

include_raw_content.description: Include the full cleaned HTML content of each result in markdown format.

max_results.description: Maximum number of search results to return.

include_domains.description: Optional list of domains to specifically include in results.
